summary: A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.
cast: Halle Berry|Olivier Martinez|Sizwe Msutu|Mark Elderkin|Thoko Ntshinga|Henrik Vos|Judith Kronenberg-Sarembock|Wayne Harrison|Josef Du Plessis|Jessica Taylor|Ralph Brown|Luke Tyler|P.J. Van Der Walt|Gary Jacobie|Eugene Seloca|Christian Zuidema
keywords: jelly fish|touching a shark|can of beer|spear gun|life vest
title: Marea letal
